beer.name: Chamberlain
beer.description: This classic English style pale ale is named after renowned Civil War hero Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain. The golden copper color of this award-winning beer is enhanced by Pale Ale, Crystal, and Chocolate malts. Chamberlain Pale Ale is dry and crisp upfront with aromatic hoppy finish, featuring Fuggles, Cascade, and Tettnang hops.
beer.grains: Pale Ale, Crystal, and Chocolate malts
Pale Ale, Crystal, and Chocolate malts
